text: Amelita "Ming" Jara Martinez-Ramos (born December 29, 1926) is the wife of Fidel V. Ramos–the twelfth President of the Philippines–and was the eleventh First Lady of the Philippines from 1992 to 1998. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:Living people Category:First Ladies and First Gentlemen of the Philippines
title: Amelita Ramos
